short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save work achievements, helpful files, and get feedback. Ace promotion cycles + job searches. Yours always, even if you change jobs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more scrambling during review cycles. No more racking your brain for why you deserve that raise. No more losing all your accomplishments if you have to change jobs.

Aimbler is your career home, regardless of your job. Our Chrome Extension helps you save your work accomplishments, store helpful files, and track time spent on specific tasks. 

The average person spends 1.5 hours/year on their career. Be average, but have the above average career you've dreamed of by using Aimbler.
